name: Color Cingdom
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
Color Cingdom is a game in which you need to connect the pieces together and get points for the connection. The more there is a bunch of shapes, the more points you will get.

When you destroy a bunch of figures, more figures are falling, so you need to make sure that there are no single crystals left at the bottom.
Dial a certain number of points to get to the next level. At each level, the time of passage is set, when you destroy the figures, the time is added.

Collect all the crystals!

★ Stunning graphics and effects
★ Smooth, enjoyable gameplay
★ Easy and addictive gameplay
★ Fantastic soundtrack
★ Relax
